message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this incredible product. I think you'll love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $20,000. Let me know if you're interested!
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer.  I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit too high for my budget. Would you consider $12,000?

I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. Let me know if that works for you!
Hi Alice, thanks for coming down on the price. I'm getting closer to my budget but still not quite there. How about $14,000?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $16,000. That's as low as I can go. Let me know if that's acceptable to you!
Alice, this is getting very close to my limit. I could go up to $14,500.  But that's really the most I can do.

I can see you're really stretching your budget, Bob! I appreciate your persistence. I'm willing to meet you at $15,000, which is the lowest price I can accept. Let me know if that's a deal-breaker for you!
